title: 820-00850 fries USB devices when connected to charger.
message:
MacBook had liquid damage.
It stayed at 5V.

CD301 and pad on the board was melted. CD301 and UB300 has been replaced.
Board had CD3215C00Z and used C00 (is that still OK?)
One USB C port had burned pin ports on one side has been replaced.

Got 20V, board works, charge battery etc and now the funny stuff..
Without charger any USB device works, it is visible in the macOS etc. but as soon I connect charger it just fries that USB device. Looks like instead 5V board send 20V?

title: 820-00850 fries USB devices when connected to charger.
820-00850 fries USB devices when connected to charger.
message: All four MOSFETs replaced and all works fine now - again... thank you very much for help :)
